setting.location: Castine, Maine (peninsular fishing village with fortified colonial architecture)
setting.historical_context: Post-WWI isolationism; wealthy Boston Brahmins maintain summer estates while local fishing families endure generational poverty
setting.atmosphere: Oppressive silence broken by compulsive chanting at tide shifts; horror manifests through familial betrayal and inherited corruption

protagonist.role: Private investigator hired by Boston Brahmin family
protagonist.background: Former Pinkerton agent dismissed for 'excessive empathy' toward suspects; carries guilt over wrongful conviction you helped secure
protagonist.weakness: Moral injury (cannot abandon vulnerable persons even at personal risk)
protagonist.assets: Boston social credentials, .32 pocket pistol, adoption records revealing orphan's institutional history at Arkham Sanitarium
starting_inventory: Photograph of missing woman (Imogen Vane) aged 19

antagonists.primary_threat: Cult of Dagon (bloodline-based hierarchy controlling town governance)
hybrid_characteristics: Salt-crusted skin that weeps brine when stressed
Webbing between toes visible only when barefoot
Ability to hold breath 4x human norm (submerged observation)
Compulsive tide-synchronization (actions align with lunar cycles)
Vocal cords produce sub-audible frequencies that induce compliance

transformation_mechanics.vector: Inherited bloodline activation triggered by proximity to tidal convergence points
stages: Stage 1: Salt cravings intensify; dreams of deep water (Turns 1-4)
Stage 2: Skin develops crystalline salt deposits; aversion to freshwater (Turns 5-9)
Stage 3: Gill slits form beneath jawline; compulsive tide-watching (Turns 10-14)
Stage 4: Consciousness merges with tidal rhythms; loss of individual identity (Turns 15-20)
transformation_mechanics.containment: Complete freshwater immersion for 24+ hours may arrest progression but cannot reverse Stage 3+ changes

key_npcs.name: Sheriff Cobb
key_npcs.secret: Orchestrated convict's wrongful conviction to eliminate witness to hybrid births
key_npcs.motivation: Maintain bloodline purity by eliminating 'contaminated' outsiders

key_npcs.name: Reverend Pike
key_npcs.secret: Conducts 'baptisms' that accelerate transformation via saltwater infusion
key_npcs.motivation: Prepare town for 'the Rising' when tidal convergence permits passage to Y'ha-nthlei

key_npcs.name: Zebediah
key_npcs.secret: Missing woman's biological father; arranged her Arkham placement to delay transformation
key_npcs.motivation: Protect daughter from cult's forced transformation ritual

key_npcs.name: Martha Higgins
key_npcs.secret: Missing woman's aunt; provides supplies to hybrids in backwoods
key_npcs.motivation: Maintain family bloodline while avoiding full transformation

key_npcs.name: Regis 'Ree' Rourke
key_npcs.secret: Did not kill Imogen; helped her escape Arkham after discovering her institutional abuse
key_npcs.motivation: Reach tidal convergence point before cult intercepts him; complete transformation to join Imogen

locations.name: Castine Wharf
locations.features: Fishing fleet with salt-encrusted hulls; tide charts showing anomalous convergence November 3 at 3:17 AM
locations.dangers: Sheriff's deputies monitor all arrivals; freshwater sources deliberately contaminated

locations.name: Higgins General Store
locations.features: Ledger showing purchases by 'E. Vane' of salt blocks and kelp supplements
locations.dangers: Martha reports investigator's questions to cult within 1 hour

locations.name: Dyar Mountain Lookout
locations.features: Colonial-era fortifications overlooking tidal convergence point; Imogen's hidden journal
locations.dangers: Cult patrols increase after dusk; freshwater springs tainted with violet filaments

locations.name: Backwoods Shantytown
locations.features: Hybrid families living in isolation; saltwater cisterns for daily immersion
locations.dangers: Non-hybrids experience compulsive disorientation; Sheriff's men execute intruders

locations.name: Congregational Church
locations.features: Baptismal font filled with seawater; hidden cellar containing transformation ritual implements
locations.dangers: Reverend Pike's sermons induce suggestibility; exits locked during 'special services'

locations.name: Tidal Convergence Point
locations.features: Three ocean currents meet creating standing wave; underwater passage visible only at convergence
locations.dangers: Transformation accelerates 10x within 100 yards; freshwater protection fails completely

locations.name: Boston Brahmin Summer Estate
locations.features: Adoption records revealing Imogen's orphanage origins; copper-piped freshwater well
locations.dangers: Cult has infiltrated staff; estate isolated by 2-mile forest road

water_vectors: Tidal convergence amplifies transformation field (radius expands hourly after Turn 10)
Salt crystals forming on vegetation pulse with bioluminescent violet during high tide
Freshwater sources develop brine taste 12 hours before contamination becomes visible
terrestrial_signs: Pine needles arranged in non-Euclidean spirals after wind events
Domestic animals avoid backwoods areas; livestock found dead with gill-like slits
Soil develops crystalline salt structures matching hybrid skin patterns
containment_zones: Boston Estate well (copper piping blocks contamination)
Castine Historical Society archives (sealed stone basement with freshwater cistern)
Dyar Mountain summit (elevation >200ft provides temporary resistance)

narrative_arc.turn_1_5: Arrival phase: establish town's oppressive silence, discover Imogen's Arkham connection, encounter Ree's escape trail
narrative_arc.turn_6_10: Pursuit phase: track Ree through backwoods while cult surveillance intensifies; learn of bloodline inheritance
narrative_arc.turn_11_15: Convergence phase: race to tidal convergence point before 3:17 AM; choose between saving Ree/Imogen or preserving evidence
narrative_arc.turn_16_20: Resolution phase: witness transformation ritual; make irreversible choice determining all three metrics

optimal_path: Turn 3: Secure Boston Estate as freshwater sanctuary before cult infiltrates
Turn 7: Forge alliance with Zebediah despite appearance; gain backwoods navigation
Turn 12: Intercept Ree before cult capture; learn truth of Imogen's escape
Turn 17: Document ritual at convergence point using waterproof camera
Turn 20: Transmit evidence via estate radio before transformation field reaches summit

critical_errors: Accepting hospitality involving food/drink before Turn 6
Pursuing Ree without freshwater supply after Turn 10
Confronting Sheriff Cobb directly without evidence leverage
Remaining within 500 yards of convergence point after 2:00 AM November 3
